programme.title: Ghost Town Anthology
programme.desc: Set in a small town in Quebec, the film centres on the inhabitants of the town who are struggling to cope after teenager Simon Dubé is killed in a car accident. As the family and town grieve, the residents begin to report several ghost sightings.

programme.title: Amerika Square
programme.desc: In modern-day Athens, a racist local disrupts the escape plans of a Syrian doctor and an African Singer who both want to smuggle out of Greece. As time runs out, tattoo artist Billy steps in to organize their desperate escape.

programme.desc: Teppo, the leader of a gang of neo-nazis, falls in love with Sari. To his shock, Sari’s son is black, and Teppo finds his prejudices and loyalties pitted against his desire for love and family.

programme.title: Heart Of A Lion
programme.desc: Teppo, the leader of a gang of neo-nazis, falls in love with Sari. To his shock, Sari’s son is black, and Teppo finds his prejudices and loyalties pitted against his desire for love and family.

programme.title: Ghost Town Anthology
programme.desc: Set in a small town in Quebec, the film centres on the inhabitants of the town who are struggling to cope after teenager Simon Dubé is killed in a car accident. As the family and town grieve, the residents begin to report several ghost sightings.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Deadly Turquoise
programme.desc: When the corpse of a famous art expert was discovered in the dunes, Sievers and Ina are tasked to pursue any possible leads. However, findings of turquoise-coloured particles on the corpse point to the investigation of a long-lost painting

programme.title: Temporaries
programme.desc: Ariane gets a job as an interpreter at a food plant after moving back to the Richelieu Valley following a breakup. There, she finds herself torn between obeying the harsh demands of her boss and standing up for the exploited migrant workers she befriends.

programme.title: Confetti
programme.desc: Due to her dyslexia, Meimei is ostracized by her school and community. Encouraged by Meimei's teacher from school, Lan leaves everything behind in China for New York City in hopes of finding an education program for her daughter.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: In this black comedy, a sanatorium isolated in the mountains becomes a microcosm of Kyrgyzstan; its residents comprise of a tourist, a TV host, a pervert, Chinese businessmen and drugged-up youths. Excised in linear time, reality dissolves into fantasy.

programme.title: Commitment Hasan
programme.desc: Farmer Hasan is at a crossroads between challenges and new opportunities. A high-voltage mast can end up in the middle of his fertile and cultivated land. But can this invasion of modernity be resolved now that the neighbouring plot is for sale?

programme.title: Timeline
programme.desc: A romantic reunion turns into a life-or-death game of secrets and survival, where the past cannot stay hidden.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Silent Night
programme.desc: The owner of the historic Sylt company Betten-Reuter, is found dead and two infamous Santa Clauses are believed to have silenced him. Known for robbery, is the notorious pair really also capable of murder?

programme.title: Adventures In The Land Of Asha
programme.desc: After 9-year-old Jules is banned from school because of his rare skin disease, his greatest wish is to be cured. He meets a mysterious new friend, Asha, after his dog runs away into the forest. Together, they go on an adventure to find a cure for him.

programme.title: Binti
programme.desc: Faced with potential deportation as an immigrant, Binti, a 12-year-old vlogger plots a scheme with her new friend to bring their parents together to save her future.

programme.title: Bluebird
programme.desc: In small town Maine, a school bus driver becomes distracted during her end-of-day inspection and fails to notice a sleeping boy in the back of the bus. What happens next shatters the tranquillity of her small logging town.

programme.title: Run Up!
programme.desc: After a life-altering accident shatters her dreams, Elodie, a young hiker turned paraplegic, discovers the power of wheelchair sports. With the help of her trainer Isabelle, she is able to awaken from her lethargy and recognize true victories in life.

programme.title: Pure White
programme.desc: Vural, a husband and a father who was raised in faith, leads a seemingly pious and conformist life. Yet, everything takes a sudden dark turn when he learns a truth that will force him to confront his views on religion and morality.
